ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Regarding them from their cushioned seats.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: seated upon their couches, they are looking around.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: while reclining on couches and reviewing (the bounties given to them).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: as they sit on couches, gazing around.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: On Thrones (of Dignity) they will command (a sight) (of all things).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: as they (recline) upon their couches and gaze (around them).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [83:35] upon couches, in Paradise, gazing, out from their dwellings at the disbelievers while they are being tortured; and they will laugh at them just as they, the disbelievers, had laughed at them in the world.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (On high couches) in curtained canopies, (gazing) looking at the people of the Fire being dragged therein.
